channel.title: Font on Addy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Font on Addy's Blog

item.title: Several Bitmap Fonts I Made
item.description: Introduction This is a post about my selfmade bitmap fonts. I made several bitmap fonts including one iconic bitmap font, suitable for statusbar. At first I made them because I can’t find any bitmap font that suitable for my personal preferences. I want a small bitmap font that can fit in 6x10 bounding box, but placed inside 6x12 bounding box for extra line spacing. I want extra line spacing for readability reason.
